abstract: E. Neville Isdell, who will be remembered as the man who stopped Coca-Cola’s bleeding and sutured the wounds, announced Thursday that he would resign as chief executive next July.
snippet: E. Neville Isdell, who will be remembered as the man who stopped Coca-Cola’s bleeding and sutured the wounds, announced Thursday that he would resign as chief executive next July.
lead_paragraph: In the annals of Coca-Cola’s history, E. Neville Isdell may well be remembered as the man who stopped the bleeding and sutured the wounds.

headline.main: Chief of Coke to Step Down After Steering Its Recovery
headline.print_headline: Chief of Coke To Step Down After Steering Its Recovery

abstract: Coca-Cola has set up shop in a virtual world called there.com, creating an island shaped like a Coke bottle where fans can hang out and soar around.
snippet: Coca-Cola has set up shop in a virtual world called there.com, creating an island shaped like a Coke bottle where fans can hang out and soar around.
lead_paragraph: COCA-COLA lovers will have a new place to hang out starting today, and it is an island on the Internet that is shaped like a Coke bottle.

headline.main: Coke Promotes Itself in a New Virtual World
headline.print_headline: Coke Promotes Itself in a New Virtual World
